pages.title: Privacy Policy
pages.content:
Privacy Policy

Last Updated: 1. November 2024

At The Stamboom (“we,” “us,” or “our”), we are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our websitewww.thestamboom.com (the "Website") and use our services, which include creating and delivering digital graphical family trees in PNG and PDF formats (the “Services”).

By using our Website or Services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Please take a moment to read it carefully.

1. Information We Collect

We may collect and process the following categories of personal data:

a. Personal Information Provided by You:

  • Identification Data: Name, email address and other contact details you provide when creating an account or placing an order.
  • Family Information: Details you provide to build your family tree, including names, dates of birth, relationships, and other relevant data.
  • Payment Information: Financial details required for processing payments (collected by third-party payment processors, not stored by us).
  • Communication Data: Any information contained in correspondence with us via email, chat, or other communication channels.

b. Automatically Collected Information:

  • Usage Data: Information about your use of our Website, such as IP address, browser type, device information, time zone settings, and pages visited.
  • Cookies: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our Website. For more information, please refer to our Cookie Policy.

2. How We Use Your Information

We process your personal data for the following purposes:

  • To Provide Our Services: We use the family data you provide to create custom family tree graphics and deliver them in the requested formats (PNG/PDF).
  • To Communicate with You: We may contact you via email to send order confirmations, respond to inquiries, and offer customer support.
  • For Payment Processing: We may process your financial data for fulfilling transactions and processing payments.
  • To Improve Our Services: We analyze usage data to better understand how our Website is used, improve functionality, and enhance the user experience.
  • To Comply with Legal Obligations: We may process your data to comply with applicable legal and regulatory requirements.

3. Legal Basis for Processing

We rely on the following legal grounds to process your personal data:

  • Performance of a Contract: Processing your personal data is necessary for the performance of the contract when you order our Services.
  • Legitimate Interests: We may process your data based on our legitimate interests in improving and securing our Website and Services.
  • Consent: Where required by law, we will seek your consent before collecting or processing your data (e.g., for marketing communications).
  • Legal Compliance: We may process your data to comply with legal obligations.

4. Sharing Your Information

We do not sell or rent your personal data. However, we may share your data with trusted third parties under the following circumstances:

  • Service Providers: We may share your data with third-party providers to help us operate our Website and provide our Services, including payment processors, hosting providers, and IT support.
  • Legal Obligations: We may disclose your personal information if required by law or in response to valid requests from public authorities (e.g., courts or government agencies).
  • Business Transfers: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your personal data may be transferred as part of that transaction.

5. International Data Transfers

Since we are based in the Netherlands, your personal data may be transferred to and stored in countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA). If such transfers occur, we will ensure that adequate safeguards are in place to protect your information, such as the use of Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) or reliance on adequacy decisions by the European Commission.

6. Data Retention

We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. Once your data is no longer needed, it will be securely deleted or anonymized. Specific retention periods may apply in the following cases:

  • Customer Data: Retained for as long as your account remains active or as needed to provide Services.
  • Family Tree Data: Retained until you request its deletion or for a period of 3 months following completion of the Service.
  • Payment Data: Retained only as long as necessary for transaction records and accounting purposes.

7. Your Rights

Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

  • Right to Access: You may request access to your personal data held by us.
  • Right to Rectification: You have the right to request corrections of any inaccuracies in your data.
  • Right to Erasure (“Right to be Forgotten”): You may request the deletion of your data under certain conditions.
  • Right to Data Portability: You have the right to receive your data in a structured, commonly used format.
  • Right to Restrict Processing: You may request the limitation of how we process your personal data.
  • Right to Object: You may object to the processing of your data based on legitimate interests.
  • Right to Withdraw Consent: Where we rely on your consent, you can withdraw it at any time.

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info@thestamboom.com. We will respond to your request within the statutory time limits.

8. Data Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your personal data. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security, but we strive to protect your personal data using industry-standard practices.

9. Children's Privacy

Our Services are not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected personal data from a minor without proper consent, please contact us, and we will take steps to delete such information.

10. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, legal requirements, or technological advancements. The updated version will be posted on this page with the "Last Updated" date. Please review this policy periodically for any changes.

11. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data protection practices, please contact us at:

  • Email: info@thestamboom.com
  • Mailing Address: Beekstraat 1-d, 7311LD, Apeldoorn, the Netherlands, Europe

pages.title: General Terms and Conditions
pages.content:
General Terms and Conditions

Last Updated: 1. November 2024

Welcome to The Stamboom (referred to as "we", "us", or "our"). These General Terms and Conditions (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of our website www.thestamboom.com (the “Website”) and the services we provide, including the creation of digital graphical family tree products in PNG and PDF formats (the “Services”). By accessing our Website or using our Services, you agree to comply with these Terms.

Please read these Terms carefully before using our Website or Services. If you do not agree to these Terms, please refrain from using our Website and Services.

1. General Information

  • Company Name: The Stamboom
  • Registered Address: Beekstraat 1-d, 7311 LD, Apeldoorn, Netherlands, Europe
  • Chamber of Commerce (KvK) Number: 88116476
  • VAT Number: NL004544007B83
  • Email Address: info@thestamboom.com
  • Phone Number: +31 (0) 13363054

2. Definitions

  • Customer: Any individual or entity that purchases products or services from our Website.
  • Services: The creation and delivery of digital graphical family trees in PNG and PDF formats.
  • Order: A request made by the Customer to purchase our Services, which is subject to acceptance by us.
  • Content: Any data, images, graphics, or information uploaded or provided by the Customer for the purpose of creating family tree products.

3. Orders and Contract Formation

3.1 Placing an Order

  • To place an order, the Customer must complete the online order form available on our Website and provide accurate information regarding their family tree, such as names, dates of birth, and other relevant data.
  • By placing an order, the Customer makes an offer to purchase our Services subject to these Terms.

3.2 Acceptance of the Order

  • We reserve the right to accept or decline any order. Upon acceptance, a contract between the Customer and us is formed, and we will confirm the order via email.
  • The contract is only binding once the Customer receives an order confirmation from us.

3.3 Modification or Cancellation

  • Once an order is confirmed, it cannot be canceled or modified unless we expressly agree to it in writing.

4. Pricing and Payment

4.1 Prices

  • All prices listed on the Website are in EUR and US$, and include applicable taxes, unless otherwise stated.
  • We reserve the right to adjust prices at any time. However, any changes will not affect orders that have already been confirmed.

4.2 Payment Methods

  • Payments must be made through the payment methods available on our Website (e.g., credit card, PayPal, etc.).
  • Full payment is required at the time the order is placed. We will not begin processing an order until payment has been received.

5. Delivery of Services

5.1 Delivery Time

  • The digital family tree product will be delivered to the email address provided by the Customer within the estimated delivery time specified on the Website.
  • Delivery times are estimates and may vary due to factors beyond our control.

5.2 Format of Delivery

  • The final family tree product will be provided in digital formats (PNG and/or PDF) as selected by the Customer.

5.3 Customer Responsibility

  • The Customer is responsible for providing accurate family data. We are not liable for errors or omissions in the family tree resulting from incorrect or incomplete information provided by the Customer.

6. Customer Rights and Obligations

6.1 Customer Warranty

  • By providing personal or family-related information, the Customer warrants that they have the right to share such data and that all information is accurate and does not infringe on the privacy or intellectual property rights of any third party.

6.2 Use of Content

  • The Customer grants us the right to use the information provided for the sole purpose of creating the family tree product.
  • The Customer retains all rights to their personal family data, and we will not use this information for any other purpose without the Customer's consent.

7. Returns and Refunds

7.1 Refund Policy

  • Due to the personalized nature of our Services, once an order has been processed and delivered, the Customer is not entitled to a refund unless the product is defective or does not match the order specifications.

7.2 Defective Products

  • If the delivered product is defective or does not match the order details, the Customer must notify us within 14 days of delivery. We will either correct the defect or provide a replacement at no additional cost.

8. Intellectual Property

8.1 Ownership

  • All intellectual property rights in the Website, Services, and family tree designs created by us are owned by The Stamboom, except for the personal data provided by the Customer.
  • Customers may download, use, and display the final product for personal and non-commercial use only.

8.2 Prohibited Use

  • The Customer may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or exploit the family tree product for commercial purposes without our prior written consent.

9. Privacy and Data Protection

  • We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. Our use of your personal information is governed by our [Privacy Policy], which forms part of these Terms.
  • By using our Services, you consent to the collection and processing of your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

10. Limitation of Liability

10.1 Exclusion of Liability

  • To the extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, consequential, or incidental damages arising out of or in connection with the use of our Services or the Website.

10.2 Maximum Liability

  • Our total liability to the Customer for any claim arising out of or in connection with these Terms or the use of our Services shall be limited to the total amount paid by the Customer for the order in question.

11. Amendments to the Terms

  • We reserve the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. Any changes will be posted on the Website and will take effect from the date of publication. Customers are encouraged to review the Terms periodically.

12. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

  • These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands.
  • Any disputes arising from or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Arnhem, the Netherlands.

13. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these Terms or your order, please contact us at:

  • Email: info@thestamboom.com
  • Mailing Address: Beekstraat 1-d, 7311 LD, Apeldoorn, Netherlands, Europe
  • Phone: +31 (0) 13363054

pages.title: Impressum
pages.content:
Legal Notice (Impressum)

Last Updated: 1. November 2024

This Legal Notice (the “Notice”) applies to the website operated by The Stamboom (hereinafter referred to as “we,” “us,” or “our”) located at www.thestamboom.com (the “Website”).

By accessing or using our Website and services, you acknowledge and agree to the terms of this Legal Notice. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us using the information provided below.

1. Company Information

  • Company Name: The Stamboom
  • Legal Form: Sole Proprietorship
  • Registered Address: Beekstraat 1-d, 7311 LD, Apeldoorn, Netherlands, Europe
  • Chamber of Commerce (KvK) Number: 88116476
  • VAT Number: NL004544007B83
  • Email: info@thestamboom.com
  • Phone Number: +31 (0)6 13363054
  • Website URL: www.thestamboom.com

2. Responsible for Content

  • Contact Person: Ron Dudink
  • Contact Information: info@thestamboom.com

3. Intellectual Property

All content on this Website, including but not limited to text, images, graphics, logos, icons, and files (the "Content"), is the property of The Stamboom or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright, trademark, and intellectual property laws.

You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or publicly display any part of the Content without our express prior written permission. Unauthorized use of the Content may violate copyright laws and result in civil or criminal penalties.

4. Disclaimer of Liability

While we strive to ensure that the information on this Website is accurate and up-to-date, we make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the Content.

The use of our Website is at your own risk. We disclaim any liability for any damages arising from access to, or inability to use, this Website or its Content, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

5. Links to External Websites

Our Website may contain links to third-party websites for your convenience. We are not responsible for the content, accuracy, or privacy practices of such external websites. Visiting these websites is at your own risk, and we recommend reviewing their respective privacy policies and terms of service.

6. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

This Legal Notice, along with any disputes or claims arising from the use of our Website or services, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands.

By using our Website, you agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Arnhem, the Netherlands, in any legal proceedings relating to this Legal Notice or your use of our Website and services.

7. Changes to the Legal Notice

We reserve the right to amend this Legal Notice at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we encourage you to review this Legal Notice periodically for any updates.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Legal Notice, you can contact us via the following details:

  • Email: info@thestamboom.com
  • Mailing Address: Beekstraat 1-d, 7311 LD, Apeldoorn, Netherlands, Europe
  • Phone: +31 (0)6 13363054
